children.name: Standing the majority of the day has been said to increase concentration
Standing for most of the day has the potential to burn 30,000 more calories in a year
Sunflowers move throughout the day in response to the movement of the sun from east to west.
Moon flowers bloom only at night, closing during the day.
The juice from bluebell flowers was used historically to make glue.
Ostriches have the largest eyes of any land animal
Most hummingbirds weigh less than a nickel.
Arachibutyrophobia is the fear of peanut butter sticking to the roof of your mouth.
The tea bag was created by accident, as tea bags were originally sent as samples.
